# Description of DataSchema variable 

* Short name: `cog_num_c`
* Variable label: `Cognition - numeracy test - Continuous. It is assessed by means of a numeracy test, composed by six numeracy questions`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `Continuous`
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing



* Short name: `cog_num`
* Variable label: `Cognition - numeracy test. It is assessed by means of a numeracy test, composed by six numeracy questions. Discrete variable: value 0 = <=25%; value 1 = >25%.`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `Categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | <=25%
1        | >25%

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

```{r lab, echo=FALSE}
ds_label <- "Cognition - numeracy test"
ds_label_cog_num_c <- "Cognition - numeracy test - Continuous. It is assessed by means of a numeracy test, composed by six numeracy questions"
ds_label_cog_num <- "Cognition - numeracy test. It is assessed by means of a numeracy test, composed by six numeracy questions. Discrete variable: value 0 = <=25%; value 1 = >25%"
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable `cog_num_c` from the study-specific variables sum them after recoded as follows

* `keep 1 into 1`
* `recode 2 into 0`

and the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`

To compute the harmonized variable `cog_num` from `cog_num_c` it has to be recoded as follows:

* `all 1 into 1` 
* `other into 0` 
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w2}
ENRICA_w2_cog_num$sum <- apply(ENRICA_w2_cog_num[,2:6], MARGIN = 1, FUN = sum)

#all the individuals have all missing or all no missing
ENRICA_w2_cog_num$comp <- apply(ENRICA_w2_cog_num[,2:6], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(is.na(x)) )

#cog_num_c
ENRICA_ds_w2 <- tibble(id=ENRICA_w2_cog_num$id)
ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num_c <- car::recode(ENRICA_w2_cog_num$sum, "NA=999")
ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num_c <- labelled(ENRICA_ds_w2[[2]], labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))

#cog_num
ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num <- car::recode(ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num_c, "5=1; 1:4=0")
ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num <- labelled(ENRICA_ds_w2[[3]], labels = c("<=25%"=0, ">25%"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w2, echo=F}
vari <- ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num_c
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ENRICA_ds_w2, aes(x=factor(cog_num_c))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Numeracy") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(ENRICA_ds_w2, aes(x=factor(cog_num))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Immediate recall") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w2, echo=F}
Continous <- table(ENRICA_ds_w2$cog_num_c)
Continous <- c(sum(Continous[1:5]),Continous[6], Continous[7])
Dicotomic <- table(ENRICA_ds_w2[[3]], useNA = "ifany")
C <- rbind(Continous,Dicotomic)
colnames(C) <- c("(0,1,2,3,4)","5->1", "NA->999") 
kable(C, caption = "Continuous vs Dichotomous")
```

```{r importOPAL w2, echo=FALSE}
cog_num <- ENRICA_ds_w2
save(cog_num, file = "../RData/w2/cog_num.RData")
```
